content.raw:
Use of that variable is deprecated, because any interface compile flags needed by a dependent project will be provided by linking to our package's imported target.

The config file is corrected and cleaned up as of 9329963

Edit: I think we should also consider removing `_LIBRARY_DIRS` and `_LDFLAGS`, but that can wait until a later PR. We could also remove `_INCLUDE_DIRS` because the include directories will also be pulled in via the imported target, but I think we should leave that variable in, because it can be useful for people while debugging their build system.
content.html:
Use of that variable is deprecated, because any interface compile flags needed by a dependent project will be provided by linking to our package's imported target.

The config file is corrected and cleaned up as of 9329963

Edit: I think we should also consider removing _LIBRARY_DIRS and _LDFLAGS, but that can wait until a later PR. We could also remove _INCLUDE_DIRS because the include directories will also be pulled in via the imported target, but I think we should leave that variable in, because it can be useful for people while debugging their build system.
